Articles.Content:
I care about only a mod: fairing factory. Almost all of my designs contains fairing factory, and I don't want to lose them.

What do you think about Mods-0.24 compatibility?
Are you talking about this mod? I'm sure that will have an update soon after release.

Parts will need their monetary values adjusted to fit in (and maybe another value added to them?), some mods might have to include the new engines or fuel containing parts - 64bit might require dual versions from now on, but I am once more all Jon Snow at coding.

Yes. /thread.

Seriously, Fairing Factory is just parts. Nothing in the last few releases has broken parts, and I can't imagine .24 would either. If you mean Procedural Fairings, that's a bit different, but is answered above.
